short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate the web socially: share your thoughts on any webpage and view ones that others leave.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the chrome extension for agora-web.io -- an online platform that allows people to navigate the web socially.  Use this extension to share comments on webpages you find and view discourse across the web.

Downloading this chrome extension enhances your browser with a side panel that allows you to share what you find on the web as you navigate and see discourse others have had on the webpage you are on.
